name: VENTAS POR VENDEDOR
query:
select a.name as 'Folio:Link/Sales Invoice:100',
       a.posting_date as 'Fecha::100', 
       a.customer as 'Cliente::350', 
       a.currency as 'Moneda::50', 
       a.total as 'Sub Total:Currency:90', 
       a.discount_amount as 'Descuento',
      (a.grand_total) - (a.total) as 'IVA:Currency:70', 
       a.grand_total as 'Total:Currency:80', 
       case when a.docstatus = 1 then 'NO' when a.docstatus = 2 then 'SI' else a.docstatus end as 'Cancelado',
       a.agente as 'Vendedor::70'
from `tabSales Invoice` a
where a.status != '0' and a.agente = %(a.agente)s and a.perfil_facturacion = "FACTURA CREDITO"
